<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/a76b31542e1d83b7d2fe7378439912e800a4d0f6|patch 8.2.0265: "eval" after "if 0" doesn't check for following command>
patch 8.2.0265: "eval" after "if 0" doesn't check for following command

Problem:    "eval" after "if 0" doesn't check for following command.
Solution:   Add "eval" to list of commands that check for a following command.
            (closes #5640)

<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/a28be85ccde03ee0a0dc984dfd7396c50713b593|patch 8.2.0266: terminal in popup test sometimes fails on Mac>
patch 8.2.0266: terminal in popup test sometimes fails on Mac

Problem:    Terminal in popup test sometimes fails on Mac.
Solution:   Add a short delay.

attachments.title: patch 8.2.0266: terminal in popup test sometimes fails on Mac · vim/vim@a28be85

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/e51bb17dd0d51384375830ee2a1df30c08121443|patch 8.2.0267: no check for a following cmd when calling a function …>
patch 8.2.0267: no check for a following cmd when calling a function fails

Problem:    No check for a following command when calling a function fails.
Solution:   Also check for a following command when inside a try block.
            (closes #5642)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0267: no check for a following cmd when calling a function … · vim/vim@e51bb17
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0267: no check for a following cmd when calling a function … · vim/vim@e51bb17
attachments.text: …fails Problem: No check for a following command when calling a function fails. Solution: Also check for a following command when inside a try block. (closes #5642)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/40d9da2a4395025169ebaf53a63618adfa737e96|patch 8.2.0268: trycatch test fails>
patch 8.2.0268: trycatch test fails

Problem:    Trycatch test fails.
Solution:   When calling function fails only check for following command, do
            not give another error.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0268: trycatch test fails · vim/vim@40d9da2
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0268: trycatch test fails · vim/vim@40d9da2
attachments.text: Problem: Trycatch test fails. Solution: When calling function fails only check for following command, do not give another error.
